p: The first results we focused on in our research were aimed at finding two initial temperatures: Ac 1 and Ac 3. The heating of all eight samples took place under the same conditions, i.e., the heating rate was set to 1 °C∙s −1. Figure 4a explains how we initially determined the temperatures of Ac 1 and Ac 3. The results showed that in the experimental steel AISI 4340, the start temperature of Ac 1 was 725 °C, and the final temperature of austenite formation Ac 3 was 763 °C.
